prompts:
Create a sample terraform module with:
three environments called "Development", "Test", and "Production"
a docker feed pointing to dockerhub
three tenants called "US", "Europe", and "Asia"; a project group called "Web App"
a project called "Audits" with a single powershell script step that echoes "Hello World"
and all tenants linked to the project and all environments
Describe what the steps in the project "#{Octopus.Project.Name}" in the space "#{Octopus.Space.Name}"  do
Given the steps in the project "#{Octopus.Project.Name}" from the space "#{Octopus.Space.Name}", find any potential errors in any scripts
Find used variables in the project "#{Octopus.Project.Name}" from the space "#{Octopus.Space.Name}"
